points.title: How you go take get points?
points.inviteDesc: 50 Points (person wey you invite go get 30 Points)

promo.memberCta: Members fit get up to 50% discount

privacy.title: Privacy Statement
privacy.section1Body: Welcome to [www.tanzanite.site]. We dey respect your privacy and we dey serious to protect your personal information. This Privacy Policy explain how we dey collect, use, share and protect your data any time wey you visit our website [www.tanzanite.site] and use our services.
privacy.section2Title: 2. The kind information we dey collect
privacy.section2Intro: We fit collect the following kind personal information:
privacy.contactDesc: Email address, phone number, shipping / billing address
privacy.transactionDesc: Purchase history, payment details (we dey process am through secure third‑party payment providers)
privacy.technicalDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, cookies and others
privacy.marketingDesc: Preferences, feedback, answers wey you give for survey
privacy.section3Title: 3. How we take use your information
privacy.section3Intro: We dey use your data for the following reasons:
privacy.useProcessOrders: To process order and deliver product give you
privacy.useManageAccount: To manage your account and give customer support
privacy.useImproveSite: To improve how the website dey work and your user experience
privacy.usePromotions: To send promo and special offer (only if you give consent)
privacy.section4Title: 4. Who we fit share your information with
privacy.section4Intro: We fit share your data with third party for the following situation:
privacy.shareServiceProviders: Service providers: payment gateway, logistics partners, analytics tools and the rest
privacy.shareLegalAuthorities: Government or law people: when law require am or to protect our legal rights
privacy.shareBusinessTransfers: Business transaction: if company merge, another company buy us or we sell some assets
privacy.shareNoSale: We no dey sell your personal information give third party.
privacy.section5Intro: We dey use cookies and similar technology for the following reasons:
privacy.cookiesRemember: To remember your settings and things wey you like
privacy.cookiesAnalytics: To check traffic and how people dey use the website
privacy.cookiesPersonalize: To personalize content and advert for you
privacy.cookiesSettings: You fit control cookie settings for your browser.
privacy.section6Body: We don put better technical and organisational steps to protect your data from people wey no get right to see am, change am, share am or destroy am.
privacy.section7Intro: Depending on the law for where you dey, you fit get the following rights:
privacy.rightsAccess: Right to ask for access, correction or deletion of your personal data
privacy.rightsWithdrawConsent: Right to withdraw your consent at any time
privacy.rightsObjectProcessing: Right to object to some kind data processing
privacy.rightsPortability: Right to ask make we provide your data in way wey you fit move go another service
privacy.rightsContact: If you wan use any of these rights, you fit contact us.
privacy.section8Body: If you dey outside [your country], we fit transfer and process your data for [your country], and the data protection law there fit different from the one for your area.
privacy.section9Body: From time to time we fit update this Privacy Policy. Any change go show for this page together with new effective date.
